MS MCQs

    Prepare for an easy application upgrade experience in Business Central

    »

    1. Which of the following triggers are available in an installation codeunit?

      OnInstallAppPerCompany and OnInstallAppPerDatabase

      OnAfterInstallAppPerCompany

      OnAfterInstallAppPerDatabase


    2. Which technique is NOT recommended for you as a developer to avoid and deal with breaking changes?

      Use AppSourceCop to detect breaking changes

      Try to hide your internal implementations to avoid future breaks

      Don’t make any changes anymore once your app is published on AppSource

      Regularly check and compile your apps against the latest dependencies

      Use deprecation properties to announce upcoming breaks
